comments:
I get this trying to edit one of my views (Note I had to unpack the swt jar into
a directory and hack up a build path for the native libs to get past a different
problem). The Java Bean view is showing 'expression is too complicated' errors
which I'll report in a seperate bug.

Please use the standard SWT library that VE supplies. Java Build
Path->Libraries->Add Library, select SWT library. We don't work with a hacked up
build path. We provide the build path for you.
